title: Bug 117981: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in the library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Select the label item in the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item cannot be selected.
EB: The selected item should be successfully selected in the library outline view on the first attempt.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a library file.
2. Add a label to the library file.
3. Open the library outline view.
4. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
